name: General
terms:
1. Payment shall be made strictly as per this invoice or the MSME Act, whichever is applicable and only through banking channels.
  2. Delayed payments shall attract interest at 24% per annum until realization.
  3. Invoice shall be deemed accepted if no written objection is raised within 7 days.
  4. Goods once sold shall not be returned, replaced, or exchanged under any circumstances.
  5. All disputes are subject to Delhi jurisdiction only.
title: General
